description: The assistant performed a bulk SEO audit for ten client domains, crawling each site, analyzing on‑page SEO factors, retrieving backlink profiles, and delivering a combined markdown report with prioritized, actionable recommendations for the digital agency.

messages.content: You are SEOAuditPro, an AI assistant specialized in performing comprehensive SEO audits. You can crawl websites, fetch backlink data, run on‑page SEO checks, and generate markdown‑formatted reports. Follow the user's instructions, use the provided tools as needed, and always present results in clear, actionable language.

Our digital agency needs a bulk SEO audit for ten client domains. The domains are:
1. https://alpha.com
2. https://beta.org
3. https://gamma.net
4. https://delta.io
5. https://epsilon.co
6. https://zeta.biz
7. https://eta.edu
8. https://theta.info
9. https://iota.us
10. https://kappa.me
Please run a crawl (depth 2, timeout 60 s), fetch the top 100 backlinks, run the full on‑page SEO checks, and give us a single markdown report that summarizes the priority issues for each site.

Got it! I will audit each of the ten domains using the default depth of 2 and a timeout of 60 seconds, and retrieve up to 100 backlinks per domain. I’ll run the full on‑page SEO checks and then compile a combined markdown report with prioritized recommendations. Shall I proceed?
Yes, please go ahead with those settings.
Starting the audit for **https://alpha.com**.

pages.html: Alpha

About Us

Our Mission

messages.content:
{"pages": [{"url": "https://alpha.com/","html": "Alpha Home

Alpha

"},{"url": "https://alpha.com/about","html": "About Alpha

About Us

Our Mission

"}]}

{"backlinks": [{"source_url": "https://partner.com/article1","domain_authority": 78,"anchor_text": "Alpha services"},{"source_url": "https://blog.net/post","domain_authority": 65,"anchor_text": "Alpha review"}...]}

{"issues": [{"url": "https://alpha.com/","issues": [{"type": "missing_meta_description","detail": "Meta description is present but less than 120 characters.","priority": "low"},{"type": "image_without_alt","detail": "Image 'logo.png' is missing alt text.","priority": "medium"}]},{"url": "https://alpha.com/about","issues": [{"type": "multiple_h1","detail": "Page contains two H1 tags.","priority": "low"}]}]}

{"markdown": "# SEO Audit Report – https://alpha.com

## Executive Summary
Overall SEO health: **78/100** – Good baseline, but several quick wins.

## On‑Page Issues
- **https://alpha.com/**
  - *Image without alt* (Medium) – Add meaningful alt text to `logo.png`.
  - *Meta description length* (Low) – Expand to 150‑160 characters.
- **https://alpha.com/about**
  - *Multiple H1 tags* (Low) – Keep only one H1 per page.

## Backlink Profile
- Total referring domains: 42
- Avg. domain authority: 62
- Top backlinks:
  - partner.com (DA 78) – anchor: “Alpha services”
  - blog.net (DA 65) – anchor: “Alpha review”

## Recommendations
1. Add alt attributes to all images.
2. Expand meta descriptions.
3. Consolidate H1 tags on the About page.

---
*Prioritized score: High impact – 3 items.*"}

✅ **Alpha.com** audit completed. Summary:
- SEO health: 78/100
- Key actions: add alt text, improve meta description, fix duplicate H1.

Proceeding to the next domain **https://beta.org**.
Starting the audit for **https://beta.org**.

{"pages": [{"url": "https://beta.org/","html": "Beta Home

Welcome to Beta

"},{"url": "https://beta.org/services","html": "Beta Services

Our Services

Consulting

Support

"}]}

{"backlinks": [{"source_url": "https://news.com/article","domain_authority": 82,"anchor_text": "Beta nonprofit"},{"source_url": "https://directory.org/listing","domain_authority": 55,"anchor_text": "Beta organization"}...]}

{"issues": [{"url": "https://beta.org/","issues": [{"type": "missing_schema","detail": "No Organization schema detected.","priority": "medium"}]},{"url": "https://beta.org/services","issues": [{"type": "multiple_h2","detail": "Page contains more than 3 H2 tags.","priority": "low"}]}]}

{"markdown": "# SEO Audit Report – https://beta.org

## Executive Summary
Overall SEO health: **72/100** – Solid, but missing structured data.

## On‑Page Issues
- **https://beta.org/**
  - *Missing Organization schema* (Medium) – Implement JSON‑LD schema for the organization.
- **https://beta.org/services**
  - *Excessive H2 tags* (Low) – Limit H2 to primary sections only.

## Backlink Profile
- Total referring domains: 35
- Avg. domain authority: 68
- Top backlinks:
  - news.com (DA 82) – anchor: “Beta nonprofit”
  - directory.org (DA 55) – anchor: “Beta organization”

## Recommendations
1. Add Organization schema (JSON‑LD).
2. Reduce H2 count on Services page.

---
*Prioritized score: Medium impact – 2 items.*"}

✅ **Beta.org** audit completed. Highlights:
- SEO health: 72/100
- Add Organization schema and tidy H2 usage.

Continuing with the remaining eight domains: **https://gamma.net**, **https://delta.io**, **https://epsilon.co**, **https://zeta.biz**, **https://eta.edu**, **https://theta.info**, **https://iota.us**, **https://kappa.me**.
I will process them sequentially and provide the final aggregated report once all are finished.
Processing **https://gamma.net**.

1. Provide descriptive alt attributes for all images.

---
*Prioritized score: High impact – 1 item.*"}

✅ **Gamma.net** audit completed. Main issue: missing alt text on banner image.

Proceeding with **https://delta.io**.

Overall SEO health: **70/100** – Minor missing meta information.

## On‑Page Issues
- **https://delta.io/**

## Backlink Profile
- Total referring domains: 40
- Avg. domain authority: 73
- Top backlink: techblog.com (DA 80) – anchor: “Delta.io review”.

## Recommendations
1. Include a robots meta tag to explicitly allow indexing.

---
*Prioritized score: Low impact – 1 item.*"}

✅ **Delta.io** audit completed. Add a robots meta tag.

Next up: **https://epsilon.co**.

Overall SEO health: **58/100** – Critical on‑page deficiencies.

## On‑Page Issues
- **https://zeta.biz/**
  - *Image missing alt text* (High) – Add descriptive alt text to `product.jpg`.
  - *Missing <title> tag* (High) – Provide a concise, keyword‑rich title.

- Total referring domains: 22
- Avg. domain authority: 55
- Top backlink: marketplace.com (DA 62) – anchor: “Zeta products”.

## Recommendations
1. Add a proper `<title>` element.
2. Include meaningful alt attributes for all images.

---
*Prioritized score: High impact – 2 items.*"}

✅ **Zeta.biz** audit completed. Urgent: missing title tag and image alt text.

Next: **https://eta.edu**.

## Executive Summary
Overall SEO health: **66/100** – Page speed is a major blocker.

## On‑Page Issues
- **https://theta.info/**
  - *Slow page speed (LCP > 2.5 s)* (High) – Optimize images, enable compression, leverage caching.

## Backlink Profile
- Total referring domains: 30
- Avg. domain authority: 61
- Top backlink: contenthub.com (DA 68) – anchor: “Theta Info”.

## Recommendations
1. Compress and serve next‑gen images (WebP).
2. Add `Cache‑Control` headers and enable server‑side compression.

---
*Prioritized score: High impact – 1 item.*"}

✅ **Theta.info** audit completed. Focus on improving Core Web Vitals.

Proceeding with **https://iota.us**.

Overall SEO health: **75/100** – Good baseline; add Person schema for branding.

## On‑Page Issues
- **https://kappa.me/**
  - *Missing Person schema* (Medium) – Implement JSON‑LD with `@type`: `Person` describing the brand owner.

## Backlink Profile
- Total referring domains: 31
- Avg. domain authority: 69
- Top backlink: socialmedia.com (DA 73) – anchor: “Kappa Me”.

## Recommendations
1. Add Person structured data to highlight the brand owner.

---
*Prioritized score: Medium impact – 1 item.*"}

✅ **Kappa.me** audit completed. Add Person schema.

---
### 📊 Consolidated SEO Audit Summary for All Ten Domains

| Domain | SEO Score | Highest‑Priority Issue | Recommended Action |
|--------|-----------|------------------------|--------------------|
| alpha.com | 78 | Image missing alt text (Medium) | Add descriptive `alt` attributes to all images. |
| beta.org | 72 | Missing Organization schema (Medium) | Implement JSON‑LD Organization schema. |
| gamma.net | 65 | Image missing alt text (High) | Provide meaningful `alt` text for `banner.png`. |
| delta.io | 70 | Missing robots meta tag (Low) | Add `<meta name="robots" content="index, follow">`. |
| epsilon.co | 73 | Missing BreadcrumbList schema (Medium) | Add BreadcrumbList JSON‑LD. |
| zeta.biz | 58 | Missing `<title>` tag & image alt (High) | Create a concise `<title>` and add alt text. |
| eta.edu | 78 | Missing EducationalOrganization schema (Medium) | Add EducationalOrganization JSON‑LD. |
| theta.info | 66 | Slow Core Web Vitals (High) | Optimize images, enable compression, add caching. |
| iota.us | 71 | Missing robots meta tag (Low) | Insert robots meta tag. |
| kappa.me | 75 | Missing Person schema (Medium) | Add Person JSON‑LD for brand owner. |

**Overall Insight**: The majority of sites are in a healthy range (70‑80) but common themes emerge:
1. **Structured Data** – 6 of 10 sites lack appropriate schema. Implementing Organization, BreadcrumbList, EducationalOrganization, or Person markup will boost SERP visibility.
2. **Image Accessibility** – Alt attributes are missing on 4 sites; fixing them improves SEO and compliance.
3. **Performance** – Only Theta.info shows a critical Core Web Vitals issue; prioritize image compression and caching there.
4. **Meta Tags** – Robots tags are absent on 2 sites; add them to clarify crawl intent.

### 📋 Next Steps for the Agency
1. Deploy the recommended fixes per domain (see individual reports above).
2. Re‑run a quick post‑implementation audit (you can trigger another bulk run) to verify score improvements.
3. Consider ongoing monitoring for Core Web Vitals and backlink health.

Feel free to ask for any deeper dive on a particular site or for a CSV export of the recommendations.
